scripts.frontend:dev: pnpm db:start && sleep 1 && pnpm -F frontend run dev
scripts.compile-fc-anon: cd ./packages/circuits/fc_anon && wasm-pack build --release --target bundler && rm ./pkg/.gitignore && pnpm -F frontend i --no-cache && rm -rf packages/frontend/.next
scripts.compile-twitter-anon: cd ./packages/circuits/twitter_anon && wasm-pack build --release  --target bundler && rm ./pkg/.gitignore && pnpm -F frontend i --no-cache && rm -rf packages/frontend/.next
